What are skill-based activities?
questions.answer: Activities that require practice and skill are called skill-based activities.

questions.question: Why are skill-based activities important?
questions.answer: They help develop physical and mental skills.

questions.question: What do skill-based activities help improve?
questions.answer: They help improve coordination and accuracy.

questions.question: What is needed to perform skill-based activities well?
What does throwing mean?
questions.answer: Throwing means sending an object away from the body.

questions.question: Which body part is mainly used in throwing?
questions.answer: Arms are mainly used in throwing.

questions.question: Why is accuracy important in throwing?
questions.answer: Accuracy helps hit the target correctly.

What is catching?
questions.answer: Catching means receiving a moving object safely.

questions.question: Why is catching an important skill?
questions.answer: It helps control the object during games.

What is dribbling?
questions.answer: Dribbling means moving the ball while controlling it.

questions.question: Why is dribbling important?
questions.answer: It helps move the ball during games.

What is aiming?
questions.answer: Aiming means directing an object towards a target.

questions.question: Why is aiming important?
questions.answer: It helps hit the target correctly.

questions.question: Name one game that needs aiming.
questions.answer: Shooting a ball into a basket.

questions.question: What is striking?
questions.answer: Striking means hitting an object with force.

What is rolling?
questions.answer: Rolling means moving an object on the ground.

questions.answer: To improve control of the object.

What is jumping?
questions.answer: Jumping means lifting both feet off the ground.

questions.question: What is hopping?
questions.answer: Hopping means jumping on one foot.

questions.question: What is coordination?
questions.answer: Ability to use body parts smoothly together.
